p: The overall performance of ImunoAce Flu in comparison with RT-PCR is shown in Table 1. ImunoAce Flu showed high sensitivity (97.1%) in the detection of influenza A virus (95%CI: 93.8–98.9), but relatively low specificity (89.2%; 95%CI: 84.1–93.1). When the subjects were limited to patients tested within 48 hours after the onset of illness, the sensitivity and specificity were 97.9% (95%CI: 94.7–99.4) and 90.4% (95%CI: 85.1–94.3), respectively ( Table 2).
